= Introduction =

find दीर्घान्त and र्‍हस्वान्त words.


= Query to find words  दीर्घान्त  = 

SELECT word, left( reverse( word ) , 1 ) 
FROM wordbase WHERE left( reverse( word ) , 1 ) = 'ी' ORDER BY word LIMIT 10

= Query to find words  र्‍हस्वान्त =

FROM wordbase WHERE left( reverse( word ) , 1 ) = 'ि' ORDER BY word LIMIT 1000
